body:
"Over 7k is enough" the Japanese says otherwise, bringing the ammount of doujins up to over 13k in the span of 3 years.

The Japanese bros love their shipgirls.
@firepulser she is not Navy girls, she is Shipgirls who built for battle purpose. do you ever read official Kancolle manga? Female Navy Girl (not the shipgirls) is wearing outfit same as Male captain
She's so cute. Nice art as well.

nah, getting tired of all the kantai collection stuff. Way too many shipgirl doujins now. Real Navy girls don't wear skirts anyways. Anyways, I like loli stuff for sure but so sick of the bullshit Navy crap. There's just no originality in it anymore and so much rape and bbm content *gag*. Anyways over 7k kantai collection doujins is enough, it's time to move on. Oh and for loli anime, Black Bullet takes the cake, lots of canon loli shipping. So just to make sure I'm being clear, good doujin, but I'm sick of seeing the male ship captain w/ shipgirl combination.

Kantai collection. Is still the best 
Cuz for lolis ( ͡◉ ͜ʖ ͡◉)
